About Orin USA

We are a dedicated provider of Technical and Human Capital Resources, categorized as premier provider for some of our largest and long-standing clients

Our Services

Orin's approach is quite simple - to be large enough to provide all resources needed for turnkey solutions, still small enough to have a clear customer focus.


Network Deployment and Integration

Orin USA has built a Global reputation for providing high quality consulting services to the telecommunications industry and to industry segments requiring medium-to-large scale network deployments.

Carrier Professional Services

Orin USA’s Carrier Professional Services (CPS) Group provides professionals to telecommunications carriers throughout the United States. Our understanding of this area of the telecom industry assures our clients that we can quickly and correctly identify their needs AND the professionals to fulfill them, contributing to their project or team in an expeditious and profitable manner.

Information & Techcnology Services

Orin USA’s Information and Technology Services (ITS) Group handles the professional recruiting services for our client’s needs in the information systems areas.
